pageContext.claim: “One of the reasons you see optimism is because people can actually use their land. They can farm their land.”
pageContext.analysis: Trump likes to say that the Obama-era Clean Water Act rule, also called Waters of the United States, prohibited farmers, ranchers, agricultural workers and homebuilders from doing work on their land. But this claim is nonsensical because the rule never went into effect, and it got blocked by the courts.
